text.tspan: Disability-Adjusted Life Years (DALYs) attributed to lead exposure. DALYs measure the total burden of disease â€“
both from years of life lost due to premature death and years lived with a disability. One DALY equals one year of
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2024)
